title: Dell security advisory (AV25-306)
description: Between May 26 and June 1, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Dell APEX Cloud Platform for Red Hat OpenShift  versions prior to 03.03.01.00
Dell Avamar  multiple versions and products
Dell Connectrix SANnav  versions prior to 2.3.1a
Dell NetWorker Virtual Edition (NVE)  multiple versions
Dell PowerProtect DP Series Appliance (IDPA)  versions prior to 2.7.8
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
